title: The Writer's Almanac - Tuesday, March 16, 2021
description: “When I finish any project, it feels like a dream, and writing — whether it’s fiction or nonfiction — is very similar to dreaming.” --Alice Hoffman born on this day in 1952.
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
itunes:subtitle: “When I finish any project, it feels like a dream, and writing — whether it’s fiction or nonfiction — is very similar to dreaming.” --Alice Hoffman born on this day in 1952.
